name: Extract acestream and sopcast links from a web page

elements.name: Extract links given the path to a local html file -- @1.1

steps.name: the local file tests/resources/html/sample_1.html
I extract all links
I should get 5 acestream links and 4 sopcast links

elements.name: Extract links given the path to a local html file -- @1.2

steps.name: the local file tests/resources/html/sample_2.html
I extract all links
I should get 7 acestream links and 5 sopcast links
the url http://localhost:9999/sample_1.html
I download and extract all links
I should get 5 acestream links and 4 sopcast links
the url http://localhost:9999/sample_2.html
I download and extract all links
I should get 7 acestream links and 5 sopcast links

elements.name: Create a history file from a downloaded web page and save to a txt file

steps.name: a web url http://localhost:9999/sample_2.html
I generate a plexus history file from a downloaded web page and save to a txt file
I expect the plexus history file to look like this

elements.name: Create a history file from a local html file

steps.name: a local html file tests/resources/html/sample_1.html
I generate a plexus history file from a local html file
I expect the plexus history file to look like this

elements.name: Create a history file from a downloaded web page

steps.name: a web url http://localhost:9999/sample_1.html
I generate a plexus history file from a downloaded web page
I expect the plexus history file to look like this

elements.name: Create a history file from html containing acestream and sopcast urls

steps.name: a string of html
text: <title>Sheffield Utd – Crystal Palace. LiveStream, Live Übertragung: / Fußball. England. Premier League / 18 August / LiveTV</title>

steps.name: I generate a plexus history file from a string of html
I expect the plexus history file to look like this

elements.name: Create a history file from a string of raw acestream and sopcast urls

steps.name: a string of raw urls
I generate a plexus history file from a string of raw urls
I expect the plexus history file to look like this
I open the url "http://localhost:8080/index.html"
I expect that the title is "My own Kodi Web Interface Addon"

arguments.value: My own Kodi Web Interface Addon

elements.name: View the plexus scraper urls web page

steps.name: I open the url "http://localhost:8080/index.html"
I click on the link named "plexus.php"
I expect to see some existing plexus scraper urls

elements.name: Add a new plexus scraper url -- @1.1

steps.name: I open the url "http://localhost:8080/plexus.php"
I save a new url http://somedomain.com/page_1.htm in slot url_1
I expect http://somedomain.com/page_1.htm to be saved in slot url_1
